Place Bootstrap 5.3.3 files here for local hosting:

Required files:
- bootstrap.min.css
- bootstrap.bundle.min.js

Recommended source:
- https://getbootstrap.com/ (download release 5.3.3)
- Or copy from jsDelivr: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.3/dist/

After placing the files, pages will prefer local assets and fall back to CDN only if files are missing.
